title: Turtles And Tortoises
description: Models and animations of turtles and tortoises
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=pnGs22wz5LI

This package includes 3D Models of 10 species of turtles and tortoises
(Alligator snapping turtle, Chinese box turtle, Chinese pond turtle,
Green sea turtle, Loggerhead sea turtle, Aldabra giant tortoise,
Galapagos tortoise, Red-footed tortoise, Yellow-footed tortoise, African
spurred tortoise(Sulcata)).

This package includes 13 middle poly models and 13 low poly models
(SnappingTurtle, BoxTurtle, ChinesePondTurtle, Greenseaturtle,
LoggerHeadSeaTurtle, LoggerHeadSeaTurtleYoung, AldabraGiantTortoise,
DomeGalapagosTortoise, SuddlebackGalapagosTortoise,
DomeToSuddlebackMopher, RedFootedTortoise, YellowFootedTortoise, Sulcata).
Low poly models are also set as LOD1 of middle poly models.
DomeToSuddlebackMopher have DomeGalapagosTortoise as a base mesh and
SuddlebackGalapagosTortoise as Morph Target.
BoxTurtle and ChinesePondTurtle are shared the skeleton.
Greenseaturtle and LoggerHeadSeaTurtle are shared the skeleton.
AldabraGiantTortoise and GalapagosTortoises are shared the skeleton.
RedFootedTortoise, YellowFootedTortoise and Sulcata are shared the skeleton.

There are walk, attack, hit and eat animations.
There are swim animations except Sulcata skeleton.
Blueprints for a simple random walk are included Blueprints folder for
each turtle or tortoise.
These are subclasses of BP_CommonTurtle.
This is using the root motion.
These Blueprints are used in Maps/Demonstration.
These can be used by drag and drop into the scene.

For more information

animations. Swim animations are InPlace only.)
